tomato_fact: Tomatoes are technically fruits, not vegetables!

about_mission: Verdex is a smart, multilingual plant identification app designed to help users discover, learn about, and care for plants around them. Our mission is to make plant knowledge accessible to everyone, everywhere, in their own language.
about_team: Developed by a passionate team of botanists, engineers, and designers, Verdex combines advanced AI with a beautiful, user-friendly interface.
about_audience: Whether you're a gardener, student, or nature lover, Verdex is your companion for exploring the world of plants.
privacy_policy_text:
Privacy Policy for Verdex

Last updated: June, 2024

Verdex ("we", "us", or "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our plant identification app ("Verdex").

1. Information We Collect
- Personal Information: Name, email, profile photo, and language preferences.
- Usage Data: App usage statistics, device information, and crash logs.
- Images: Photos you upload for plant identification.
- Location Data: Only if you enable location-based features.

2. How We Use Your Information
- To provide and improve Verdex's features and services.
- To personalize your experience and language.
- To respond to your feedback and support requests.
- To analyze usage and improve app performance.

3. Sharing Your Information
- We do not sell your personal information.
- We may share data with trusted third-party service providers for analytics and crash reporting.
- We may disclose information if required by law.

4. Data Security
- We use industry-standard security measures to protect your data.
- You are responsible for keeping your login credentials secure.

5. Your Rights
- You can update or delete your profile information at any time.
- You can request deletion of your account and data by contacting support.

6. Children's Privacy
- Verdex is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect data from children.

7. Changes to This Policy
- We may update this Privacy Policy. We will notify you of significant changes.

8. Contact Us
If you have questions or concerns, contact us at: support@verdex.app
terms_text:
Terms & Conditions for Verdex

Last updated: June 25, 2024

Welcome to Verdex! By using our plant identification app ("Verdex"), you agree to these Terms & Conditions.

1. Use of the App
- You must be at least 13 years old to use Verdex.
- You agree to use Verdex only for lawful purposes.

2. User Content
- You retain ownership of images and content you upload.
- By uploading, you grant us a license to use your content for identification and app improvement.
- Do not upload offensive, illegal, or copyrighted material you do not own.

3. Account Security
- You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account.
- Notify us immediately of unauthorized use.

4. Intellectual Property
- Verdex and its content are protected by copyright and trademark laws.
- You may not copy, modify, or distribute any part of Verdex without permission.

5. Limitation of Liability
- Verdex is provided "as is" without warranties.
- We are not liable for any damages arising from your use of Verdex.

6. Termination
- We may suspend or terminate your access if you violate these terms.

7. Changes to Terms
- We may update these Terms & Conditions. Continued use means you accept the changes.

8. Governing Law
- These terms are governed by the laws of Cameroon.

9. Contact Us
If you have questions, contact us at: support@verdex.app
